description:
Resample an annotation file to different meshes.

Resample an annotation file from the source mesh to the target mesh.

Only annotations in surface space are modified, no changes are made to annotations in other spaces.  The -surface-pair option may be repeated for additional structures used by surface space annotations.

source_surface.title: source_surface
source_surface.description: the midthickness surface of the current mesh the annotations use

target_surface.title: target_surface
target_surface.description: the midthickness surface of the mesh the annotations should be transferred to

items.description: pair of surfaces for resampling surface annotations for one structure

surface_pair.description: pair of surfaces for resampling surface annotations for one structure
